name: AIP/ Vincent Price Movies Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which is the only Corman-Poe film NOT to star Vincent Price?
Which of these films is based on a short story of Poe's, and NOT a poem?
questions.explanation:
The Tomb of Ligeia.

	The alternate title for 'The Conquerer Worm' was 'Witchfinder General'. Can't figure out which I like better.

questions.text: Which of these Poe films starring Vincent Price is NOT one of the Corman series?
options: The Masque of the Red Death
questions.explanation:
The Oblong Box.

	'The Oblong Box' was made by a British film company.

questions.text: Which of these tales was NOT featured in 'Tales of Terror'?
options: The Strange Case of Monsieur Valdermar

questions.text: Although it is not mentioned as one of the 'Tales of Terror', what story is hidden among the other three tales?
questions.explanation:
The Cask of Amontillado.

	During the 'Black Cat' sequence, Price and Lorre have a drinking contest of Amontillado Sherry.

questions.text: Which film featured Christopher Lee along with Price?
Which film featured much of the same cast as 'The Raven'?
questions.explanation:
The Comedy of Terrors.

	Both films starred Vincent Price, Boris Karloff, and Peter Lorre. The alternate title of 'The Comedy of Terrors' is 'Much Ado About Murder.'

questions.text: Which film was made in two weeks because Corman had some money left over from 'The Raven'?
questions.explanation:
The Terror.

	Both films feature Boris Karloff and a young Jack Nicholson. 'The Terror' was also seen in the beginning of the Karloff film 'Targets' by Peter Bogdonovich.

questions.text: What character from another Poe short story makes an appearance in 'The Masque of the Red Death'?
questions.explanation:
Hoptoad.

	Hoptoad is a dwarf who gets his revenge against the cruel people who've taunted him.

questions.text: Here's a good one! In which film does somebody NOT get buried alive?
questions.correct: The Masque of the Red Death
questions.explanation: The Masque of the Red Death.
